body:
## What's Changed
* Added Ukrainian language by @null-none in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/139
* MANIFEST.in: Include usual targets by @jayvdb in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/120
* JazzBand project guidelines by @brylie in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/166
* Update import for django 4.0 by @saschahofmann in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/169
* Update README.md by @raybesiga in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/168
* Add django 4.0 and python 3.9/3.10 to test matrix. by @valberg in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/173
* Fix docstring for accepted invite signal by @tigranl in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/131
* Passed request as an argument into invite_accepted signal by @aaronkazah in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/117
* refactor(models): use get_current_site from django shortcuts by @scratchmex in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/150
* Make "inviter" be an raw_id_field in admin by @valberg in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/146
* Add i18n tags by @MrCordeiro in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/149
* Add invitation object as an argument to the invite accepted signal by @adiman9 in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/156
* Fix tests by @valberg in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/174
* Add .pre-commit-config.yaml by @valberg in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/175
* Set inviter in SendJSONInvite by @rosexi in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/151
* Make accept-invite viewname configurable in django settings by @BartoszCki in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/177
* Use poetry for package management. by @valberg in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/179
* Sphinx based documentation by @valberg in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/178
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/180
* Add documentation for swappable forms. by @valberg in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/181
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/184
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/185
* Correct spelling mistakes by @EdwardBetts in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/186
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/187
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/188
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/189
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/190
* Fix release workflow to actually publish by @jezdez in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/195
* Fix flake8 and tox dependencies by @brylie in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/198

## New Contributors
* @null-none made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/139
* @jayvdb made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/120
* @brylie made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/166
* @saschahofmann made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/169
* @raybesiga made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/168
* @valberg made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/173
* @tigranl made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/131
* @aaronkazah made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/117
* @scratchmex made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/150
* @MrCordeiro made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/149
* @adiman9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/156
* @rosexi made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/151
* @BartoszCki made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/177
* @pre-commit-ci made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/180
* @EdwardBetts made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/186
* @jezdez made their first contribution in https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/pull/195

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jazzband/django-invitations/compare/1.9.3...2.0.0
